name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.charIndex
description: The charIndex read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the index position of the character in the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text that was being spoken when the event was triggered.

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'charIndex' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
